text.name: sys_info
text.text: Palm / Garnet Personnal assistant port. Eighth 1996 Files Touchpad

text.name: sys_description
text.text: Palm OS was a mobile operating system originally developed by Palm, Inc. for personal digital assistants (PDAs) in 1996. Palm OS was designed to be easy to use with a touchscreen-based graphical user interface. It included a suite of basic applications for managing personal information. Over time it was also adapted for smartphones. So there have been several ARM processors over time and it's impossible to talk about power. At the level of the games we can only note that they are coded in C/C++.
